Detailed Description

Mob2DRenderer: Uses OpenGL to render the scene. Its rendering process is described in the comments of VARender. This only handles texture binding as far as the actual rendering process is concerned. Drawing is handled by the Mob2D_node. This is a Meyers Singleton class initalized by Mob2D. Only the Mob2D class may call methods of this class.
